creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Card case, square, folding, with two embroidered dark blue satin panels mounted on a folded strip of medium blue satin lined with pink silk.  The panels forming the pockets are embroidered with a dragon design in gold and silver threads couched in colored silks.  Narrow braid border in blue and white.
title: Card Case
